title: Weekly Digest (12 April, 2020 - 19 April, 2020)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 45 issues were created.
Of these, 19 issues have been closed and 26 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #10363 [Feature Request: Mobile Push Notifications](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10363), by [JonahAragon](https://github.com/JonahAragon)
:green_heart: #10362 [Can't load any messages after rejoining a public group](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10362), by [KyleNie](https://github.com/KyleNie)
:green_heart: #10361 [Update translations](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10361), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:green_heart: #10360 [feat: add i18n strings for the missing strings](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10360), by [jrainville](https://github.com/jrainville)
:green_heart: #10359 [Add help text to Account settings > Type](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10359), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #10357 [Dont send extra contacts](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10357), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #10356 [Upgrade e2e](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10356), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10354 [Refactor delete account algorithm to properly remove deleted account](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10354), by [PascalPrecht](https://github.com/PascalPrecht)
:green_heart: #10353 [Feature Request: Addition of Unstoppable Domains resolution into the application](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10353), by [corpetty](https://github.com/corpetty)
:green_heart: #10352 [DARK MODE for status-im on iOS and andriod](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10352), by [epicodertime](https://github.com/epicodertime)
:green_heart: #10349 [fix: display value decimals instead of using exp notation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10349), by [richard-ramos](https://github.com/richard-ramos)
:green_heart: #10348 [Scroll position in chat is not maintaining (chat is auto-scrolling when new message is coming)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10348), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10346 [Build front-end user referral flow ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10346), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #10345 [Token ENS name is not resolved in EIP-681 links](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10345), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10344 [[WIP] Upgrade status-go](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10344), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #10342 [fix: fix mailserver popup showing after canceling it](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10342), by [jrainville](https://github.com/jrainville)
:green_heart: #10340 [upgrade Nix packages, and a lot of dependencies](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10340), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #10338 [WIP Add component library skeleton](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10338), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #10336 [Add sticker submissions to market place](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10336), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #10335 [Please update Bouncy Castle](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10335), by [Neustradamus](https://github.com/Neustradamus)
:green_heart: #10334 [Send Anonymous Messages in public chats](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10334), by [errorists](https://github.com/errorists)
:green_heart: #10333 [Show redeem text for Keycard redeem txs](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10333), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:green_heart: #10330 [Use a single in-progress? flag for signing](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10330), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:green_heart: #10327 [fix: added navigationBarColor to style](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10327), by [richard-ramos](https://github.com/richard-ramos)
:green_heart: #10326 [Can't add same account in wallet as the removed 'Watched only account'](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10326), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #10325 [Request compressed keys](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10325), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #10358 [[#10277] [keycard] Fix tx signing for derived accounts](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10358), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #10355 [[WIP] Tests/upgrade](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10355), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10351 [fix: show message when loading new transactions instead of no tx msg](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10351), by [jrainville](https://github.com/jrainville)
:heart: #10350 [upgrade Xcode to 11.4.1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10350), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10347 [[#10203] Endless spinner when sending two TX in a batch in Dapp](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10347), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10343 [fix #8717 change ens welcome screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10343), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #10341 [upgrade to Xcode 11.4](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10341), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10339 [fix Gradle permission errors during build](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10339), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10337 [Scanning EIP links e2e](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10337), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10332 [fix: strip leading and trailing whitespace from QR Code data](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10332), by [michaelsbradleyjr](https://github.com/michaelsbradleyjr)
:heart: #10331 [fix autoCapitalize warning](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10331), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #10329 [fix android build on MacOS](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10329), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10328 [Show correct error message when signing typed data](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10328), by [PascalPrecht](https://github.com/PascalPrecht)
:heart: #10324 [update help messages in Makefile targets](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10324), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10323 [Logging in networks](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10323), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #10322 [Update Russian, Korean, and Chinese translation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10322), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:heart: #10321 [[#10272] Hide key-uid from keycard login screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10321), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #10320 [Update en.json](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10320), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:heart: #10319 [Copy change 'Hide previews' > 'Block screenshots'](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10319), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #10363 [Feature Request: Mobile Push Notifications](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10363), by [JonahAragon](https://github.com/JonahAragon)
It received :+1: x2, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x0.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #10343 [fix #8717 change ens welcome screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10343), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
It received 10 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 45 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 15 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #10360 [feat: add i18n strings for the missing strings](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10360), by [jrainville](https://github.com/jrainville)
:yellow_heart: #10357 [Dont send extra contacts](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10357), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)

:yellow_heart: #10354 [Refactor delete account algorithm to properly remove deleted account](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10354), by [PascalPrecht](https://github.com/PascalPrecht)

:yellow_heart: #10344 [[WIP] Upgrade status-go](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10344), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:yellow_heart: #10342 [fix: fix mailserver popup showing after canceling it](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10342), by [jrainville](https://github.com/jrainville)
:yellow_heart: #10340 [upgrade Nix packages, and a lot of dependencies](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10340), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:yellow_heart: #10338 [WIP Add component library skeleton](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10338), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #10333 [Show redeem text for Keycard redeem txs](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10333), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:yellow_heart: #10330 [Use a single in-progress? flag for signing](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10330), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:yellow_heart: #10327 [fix: added navigationBarColor to style](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10327), by [richard-ramos](https://github.com/richard-ramos)
:yellow_heart: #10294 [Notifications](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10294), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:yellow_heart: #10217 [Shadow cljs](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10217), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:yellow_heart: #10169 [WIP Starter pack](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10169), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 30 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #10358 [[#10277] [keycard] Fix tx signing for derived accounts](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10358), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #10351 [fix: show message when loading new transactions instead of no tx msg](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10351), by [jrainville](https://github.com/jrainville)
:purple_heart: #10350 [upgrade Xcode to 11.4.1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10350), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #10347 [[#10203] Endless spinner when sending two TX in a batch in Dapp](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10347), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #10343 [fix #8717 change ens welcome screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10343), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #10341 [upgrade to Xcode 11.4](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10341), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #10339 [fix Gradle permission errors during build](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10339), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #10337 [Scanning EIP links e2e](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10337), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #10332 [fix: strip leading and trailing whitespace from QR Code data](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10332), by [michaelsbradleyjr](https://github.com/michaelsbradleyjr)
:purple_heart: #10331 [fix autoCapitalize warning](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10331), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #10329 [fix android build on MacOS](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10329), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #10328 [Show correct error message when signing typed data](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10328), by [PascalPrecht](https://github.com/PascalPrecht)
:purple_heart: #10324 [update help messages in Makefile targets](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10324), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #10323 [Logging in networks](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10323), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:purple_heart: #10322 [Update Russian, Korean, and Chinese translation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10322), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)

:purple_heart: #10313 [Increment retry count when ENS fails to verify](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10313), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:purple_heart: #10311 [Add wallet header animation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10311), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:purple_heart: #10310 [Use ms instead of seconds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10310), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:purple_heart: #10308 [fix #10058 wrong domain name shown when connecting .eth](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10308), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #10307 [fix #10039](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10307), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #10304 [Get replies directly from status-go](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10304), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:purple_heart: #10300 [Minor copy changes wallet](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10300), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:purple_heart: #10298 [Add profile screen in profile stack](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10298), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)

:purple_heart: #10251 [[keycard] Faster multiacc creation and login](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10251), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #10207 [fix #10052 make finding the public key easier in profile](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10207), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #9390 [Add web3.keycard.signTypedData](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9390), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 31 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [signals processing performance improvements [#10287]  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/de4e73a2566abd647f97d27dd195404be379b9bf) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#10277] [keycard] Fix tx signing for derived accounts](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c9308af4d8b93a9285e4771ecc2d43d719853b01) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix: show message when loading new transactions instead of no tx msg  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/4f120d99f72fee06c347fbcfc734d97d0f6c0596) by [jrainville](https://github.com/jrainville)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#10203] Endless spinner when sending two TX in a batch in Dapp  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/cc70a7e8dab06a614a4f010b404105e218a1b413) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix #8717 change ens welcome screen  english only needs work for translations  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/aebe68fa1a9c08c26c28c79aacde24e1902e7607) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [upgrade Xcode to 11.4.1  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/d68b757589d1a668074dfc50e5aee6babd56e2af) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Get replies directly from status-go  Fixes: #10297 Fixes: #10274  Before if a reply was missing (for example if it the message replied to arrived after the reply) status-react would subscribe to it dynamically and use that. This caused some flickering issues when offloading the messages from the database, as the message being replied to would be offloaded and later loaded back again, triggering scroll and ending up in a loop.  This commit changes the behavior so that status-go always adds the reply to the message. In case the message being replied to arrives after the reply, this will be included in the message update, and status-react will replace it in the local storage.  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/28a2bca01259b405ecf9acad251598c640243162) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix #10052 make finding the public key easier in profile  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/23af62430500d2e488ef9bf88bb7cfb2f87a402d) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [upgrade to Xcode 11.4  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/035e07f7bee845f3cf933b809d150ab39c6efb77) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix: strip leading and trailing whitespace from QR Code data  All leading and trailing whitespace is now removed from strings derived from QR codes, both in the case of `get-qr-code-data` (real camera) and `qr-test-view` (mock camera).  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/0a9919c991201ae764d15ad074975cb3f1c06578) by [michaelsbradleyjr](https://github.com/michaelsbradleyjr)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[keycard] Faster multiacc creation and login](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c94977c8d3898e990ff91a4e049feba2c707722e) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix Gradle permission errors during build  Specifically: org.gradle.internal.service.ServiceCreationException: Could not create service of type ScriptPluginFactory using BuildScopeServices.createScriptPluginFactory(). Caused by: org.gradle.api.UncheckedIOException: Failed to create parent directory '/build/project/android/.gradle/5.6.4' when creating directory '/build/project/android/.gradle/5.6.4/fileHashes'  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/ae411a432f836dba48b4319e26136fe979ca6cf7) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix #10039  - wasn't able to reproduce the issue as it seems that all inputs are already properly turned to lower case - added :auto-capitalize :none property to the input field though to ensure the keyboard doesn't force the user to start with an uppercase later  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/5307fdfbce914f326dab12b93dc63dae0e623bb7) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix autoCapitalize warning  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/704654353384e6579ffe5d26ee0cb8952b1eca27) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add animation to wallet header transition  Add reanimated lib  Wallet header animation  Animate android elevation  Move constants into styles  Ensure line width  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c9e6f0aff7163059c7bc288ff11a2392d94c7b2f) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix nightly e2e + new scan EIP qr e2e  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/7a89b2852a0a8e68eda024658dbb5cfda07b83f9) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix #10058 wrong domain name shown when connecting .eth  add a check on the function that adds the stateofus domain to usernames. if the username already contains a domain, don't concat stateofus domain to it  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/a5a00e0a2c4bc7e5c70272cc7b29c0373c0a553a) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add web3.keycard.signTypedData  Signed-off-by: Vitaliy Vlasov <siphiuel@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e11385e35093f6f312bf0a037dc63fe829f3fc2b) by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix Android build on MacOS due to lack of OS var  changes: - Drop use of /dev/stderr, doesn't work on MacOS - Use uname -s instead of $OS which was removed - Remove leading whitespace that fucks with Nix - Check if `/etc/os-release` exists before reading it  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/1b43e4c16b7193c9855b3e865121f23dfa93e119) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [show proper error if nkd-build is missing  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/5c8a8e83aca62cc5e3bb49eedae6fdf226b8cd0c) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Show correct error message when signing typed data  Prior to this commit `sign-message-completed` effect would always use the `wrong-password` label for error handling. We now ensure that `wrong-password` is only used in case the error in question has a code `5`, which is associated to unmatching passwords.  In any other case we'll use the `message` attached to the `error`.  Fixes #8275  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/64580f0ad1864c94e6dfa847d6e0cbc481ee8d9e) by [PascalPrecht](https://github.com/PascalPrecht)
